item.description:
Wednesday weather forecast is in the 80's. I invite advanced-level play on my net, optionally coed reverse.

We have relocated this event to The River in Allston.

I have seen as many as ten nets set up concurrently at The River, but I have no advance-knowledge or control over who else might set up nets or what they do with them. I do cap my net at 4 to 6 players total. Your best bet is to show up by 4:55 PM.

Note: There are no water fountains at The River.
item.how_to_find_us: On the grass between Soldiers Field Road and the Charles River
item.name: Grass Doubles at The River
